(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Hoe) (NNP Kee))
    (VP (VBZ has)
      (VP (VBN been)
        (VP
          (ADVP (RB rapidly))
          (VBG expanding)
          (NP (PRP$ their) (NNS stalls))
          (PP (IN in)
            (NP (DT the) (JJ last) (JJ few) (NNS years))))))
    (. .)))


nn(Kee-2, Hoe-1)
nsubj(expanding-6, Kee-2)
aux(expanding-6, has-3)
aux(expanding-6, been-4)
advmod(expanding-6, rapidly-5)
root(ROOT-0, expanding-6)
poss(stalls-8, their-7)
dobj(expanding-6, stalls-8)
prep(expanding-6, in-9)
det(years-13, the-10)
amod(years-13, last-11)
amod(years-13, few-12)
pobj(in-9, years-13)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP am)
      (ADJP (RB very) (JJ apprehensive)
        (PP (IN about)
          (NP
            (NP (DT the) (NN quality))
            (PP (IN of)
              (NP (NN food))))))
      (PP (IN at)
        (NP
          (NP (JJ big) (NNS operators))
          (PP (JJ such) (IN as)
            (NP (NNP Hoe) (NNP Kee))))))
    (. .)))

cop(apprehensive-4, am-2)
advmod(apprehensive-4, very-3)

prep(apprehensive-4, about-5)

pobj(about-5, quality-7)
prep(quality-7, of-8)
pobj(of-8, food-9)
prep(apprehensive-4, at-10)
amod(operators-12, big-11)
pobj(at-10, operators-12)
mwe(as-14, such-13)
prep(operators-12, as-14)
nn(Kee-16, Hoe-15)
pobj(as-14, Kee-16)


(ROOT
  (S (CC But)
    (NP (NNP SurprisePocket))
    (VP (VBD insisted)
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP (PRP they))
          (VP (VBD were)
            (ADJP
              (ADJP (JJR better))
              (PP (IN than)
                (NP (NNP Zeng) (NNP Zeng) (POS 's))))
            (PRN (-LRB- -LRB-)
              (SBAR
                (WHNP (WDT which))
                (S
                  (VP (VBZ is)
                    (ADVP (RB usually))
                    (VP (VBN sold)
                      (PRT (RP out))
                      (PP (IN by)
                        (NP (NN lunch)))
                      (ADVP (RB anyway))))))
              (-RRB- -RRB-))))))
    (. .)))

root(ROOT-0, insisted-3)

cop(better-7, were-6)

prep(better-7, than-8)
nn(Zeng-10, Zeng-9)
pobj(than-8, Zeng-10)
possessive(Zeng-10, 's-11)
nsubjpass(sold-16, which-13)
auxpass(sold-16, is-14)
advmod(sold-16, usually-15)

prt(sold-16, out-17)
prep(sold-16, by-18)

advmod(sold-16, anyway-20)

  (S
    (ADVP (RB cos))
    (NP (PRP I))
    (ADVP (RB really))
    (VP (VBP do) (RB n't)
      (VP (VB know)
        (SBAR
          (WHADVP (WRB how))
          (S
            (NP
              (ADJP (RB much) (JJR better))
              (NNP Century) (NNP Egg) (NNP porridge))
            (VP (MD can)
              (VP (VB get)))))))
    (. .)))

      (SBAR (IN that)

          (NP (PRP they))

    (. !)))

  (NP
    (NP
      (NP
        (ADVP (RB Currently))
        (DT the) (JJS best))
      (PRN (-LRB- -LRB-)

          (NP (JJS most) (NN value))
          (PP (IN for)
            (NP (NN money))))
        (-RRB- -RRB-)))

      (NP (NNP Century) (NNP Egg) (NNP Porridge))
      (PP (IN in)

    (. .)))
